# --
# 1.0 SQL EXTRACTS
## pull art_groups
```{sql connection=prod_conn, output.var="art_listings_bookings_raw"}
select listings_id, type, created_date, text, rate_type, rate, booking_date
from art_listings_bookings
```




# --
# 2.0 PREPARE DATA

## Bookings Prepared
```{r}
bookings_prepared_tbl <- art_listings_bookings_raw %>%
  rename(listing_id = listings_id) %>%
  # filter(type == "booked" | type == "booking") %>%
  mutate(rate = round(rate),
         rate = ifelse(rate < 0, rate * -1, rate),
         days_out = booking_date - created_date)

```


## Booked vs. Available
```{r}

## Use dtplyr for grouped calculations
query_dtplyr <- bookings_prepared_tbl %>% dtplyr::lazy_dt()



bookings_prepared_dtplyr <- query_dtplyr %>%
  
  select(listing_id, booking_date) %>%
  arrange(listing_id, booking_date) %>%
  mutate(booked = 1) %>%
  
  # grouped "pad by time" (because it can't work in dtplyr) with complete & fill
  group_by(listing_id) %>%
  tidyr::complete(booking_date = seq(min(booking_date), max(booking_date), by = "1 day")) %>%
  ungroup()



# convert back to tbl
bookings_dtplyr_tbl <- as_tibble(bookings_prepared_dtplyr)
```


## Join Data
```{r}
bookings_full_tbl <- bookings_dtplyr_tbl %>%
  left_join(bookings_prepared_tbl, by = c('listing_id', 'booking_date'))
```


## Filter by Time
```{r}
# max dates for calculation
bookings_filter_by_time <- bookings_full_tbl %>%
  filter_by_time(
    .date_var   = booking_date, 
    .start_date = today, 
    .end_date   = today_90)


# booked_all_days_out
booked_all_days_out <- bookings_filter_by_time %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    
    # days out booked
    days_out_7  = ifelse(between(booking_date, today, today_7), booked, NA),
    days_out_14 = ifelse(between(booking_date, today, today_14), booked, NA),
    days_out_30 = ifelse(between(booking_date, today, today_30), booked, NA),
    days_out_90 = ifelse(between(booking_date, today, today_90), booked, NA),
    
    # adr next n days
    adr_7_days  = ifelse(between(booking_date, today, today_7), rate, NA),
    adr_14_days = ifelse(between(booking_date, today, today_14), rate, NA),
    adr_30_days = ifelse(between(booking_date, today, today_30), rate, NA),
    adr_90_days = ifelse(between(booking_date, today, today_90), rate, NA)
  ) %>%
  
  # summarize by listing_id
  group_by(listing_id) %>%
  summarise(
    
    # booked next n days
    booked_7_days_out  = sum(days_out_7, na.rm = T)/7,
    booked_14_days_out = sum(days_out_14, na.rm = T)/14,
    booked_30_days_out = sum(days_out_30, na.rm = T)/30,
    booked_90_days_out = sum(days_out_90, na.rm = T)/90,
    
    # adr next n days
    adr_7_days  = round(mean(adr_7_days, na.rm = T)),
    adr_14_days = round(mean(adr_14_days, na.rm = T)),
    adr_30_days = round(mean(adr_30_days, na.rm = T)),
    adr_90_days = round(mean(adr_90_days, na.rm = T))
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate_all(~replace(., is.na(.), 0))
```
